column1: Clinical Education (Online Learning) MSc, PgDip, PgCert, PgProfDev
column5: Programme descriptionOur online Clinical Education programme takes advantage of our world-renowned expertise to enhance your abilities to teach and assess students in a clinical environment.This is an ideal programme for those with an educational role in relation to healthcare professionals and veterinary practitioners, including:doctorsnursesdental practitionersclinical psychologistsoccupational therapiststhose involved with veterinary educationassociated scientists (biomedical or social)What will I
column7: Tuition fees vary between degree programmes. Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on our website.
column9: MSc: 3 years, PgDip: 2 years, PgCert: 1 year, PgProfDev: 2 years
